column4: xsquareplusc: i looked in the ssh_config & sshd_config files on both server & client, and the x11forward options are all set to yes, but still i get this error when i try to use xterm:
X11 connection rejected because of wrong authentication.
xterm Xt error: Can't open display: localhost:10.0
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
